Package com.mapzen.android.graphics

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FeaturePickListener
    Interface for a callback to receive information about features picked from the map.
    LabelPickListener
    Listener invoked when a label on the map is selected.
    MarkerPickListener
    Listener invoked when a marker on the map is selected.
    OnMapReadyCallback
    Interface for receiving a MapController once it is ready to be used.
    OnStyleLoadedListener
    Callback used when loading a new MapStyle asynchronously.
    ViewCompleteListener
    Listener for when view is fully loaded and no ease or label animation running.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CompassView
    Compass button for MapView.
    GraphicsModule
    Dependency injection module for graphics components that do not depend on Android components.
    LabelPickHandler
    Takes care of calling an external label listener for a MapzenMap.
    MapFragment
    A map component in an app.
    MapInitializer
    Class responsible for initializing the map.
    MapView
    Wrapper for Tangram MapView that initializes MapzenMap for client applications.
    MapzenMap
    This is the main class of the Mapzen Android API and is the entry point for all methods related to the map.
    MapzenMapHttpHandler
    Base class for HTTP requests made by MapzenMap.
    MapzenMapPeliasLocationProvider
    This class uses a MapzenMap to return both lat/lon and a bounding box based on the map's current position.
    OverlayManager
    Adds functionality to MapController map by way of LostApiClient.
    TangramMapView
    Entry point for interaction with Tangram map.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DataLayerType
    Default data layers for bundled Mapzen stylesheets including Bubble Wrap, Cinnabar, and Refill.
